products.title: Scandi Birds Kiwi Curtain
products.description: Their scandinavian-inspired scandi birds come in bright on-trend shades. Perfect for adding to a kitchen to brighten the scheme or bringing nature to your modern home. products.title: Scandi Bloom Spruce Green Curtain
products.description: Inspired by traditional scandinavian folk art, scandi bloom is a lush pattern, consisting of bold, clean lines and coordinating colours. Breathe life into your home with this spruce green curtain, with green lush leaves with a contemporary twist, this blind will look at home in your window. Accessorise with natural materials for the ultimate scandi-look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtain comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
